tika-abh08t24:1_2: pakaraṇamidamārabhantoyamācariyo paṭhamaṁ tāva ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇena antarāyanivāraṇañceva paññāpāṭavañca pattheti.
tika-abh08t24:1_4: Sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṁ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
tika-abh08t24:1_7: rāgādimalavikkhālanena ca cittasantānaṁ parisodhetvā tannissitāya paññāya yathādhippetasiddhisampādakaṁ tikkhavisadabhāvamāvahati.
tika-abh08t24:1_10: tasmā sappurisācārānurakkhaṇatthañca ādimhi ratanattayavandanā āraddhāti evamādinā aññānipi bahūni payojanāni niddhāretabbāni.
tika-abh08t24:1_11: Tāni pana tattha tattha bahudhā vitthāritānīti taṁ papañcaparissamaṁ ṭhapetvā yathānuppattameva tāva vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-abh08t24:2_0: Ettha ca ratanattayappaṇāmaṁ kattukāmo tathāgatamūlakattā sesaratanānaṁ paṭhamaṁ tāva tathāgatassa thomanāpubbaṅgamaṁ
tika-abh08t24:2_5: khettaṅgatāya ca vandanāya yathādhippetanipphattiyā hetubhāvo ca dassito hoti.
tika-abh08t24:3_1: Tassa pana osānagāthāyaṁ “pavakkhāmī”ti iminā aparakālakiriyāvacanena saha sambandho.
tika-abh08t24:3_8: paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṁ kampanaṁ hadayakhedaṁ janayatīti attho.
tika-abh08t24:4_0: Ettha ca uppādavayantatāvasena ceva santatipariyosānavasena ca satipi bhagavato karuṇāpaññānaṁ sapariyantabhāve
tika-abh08t24:4_2: Sammāsambuddhassa hi sabbasattānaṁ dukkhāpanayanākārappavattā anaññasādhāraṇā mahākaruṇā kañci sattaṁ
tika-abh08t24:4_4: tathā sabbadhammasabhāvabodhanasamatthā sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātā paññāpi sakalañeyyadhammesu anavasesato pavattati,
tika-abh08t24:4_6: Karuṇāpaññāggahaṇena cettha bhagavato sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampatti dassitā hoti.
tika-abh08t24:4_7: Tathā hi karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato sakalalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā,
tika-abh08t24:5_2: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṁsārapaṅkato sattānaṁ samuddharaṇatthāya katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-abh08t24:5_3: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttarasammāsambodhiyā adhigamena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭilabhi.
tika-abh08t24:5_5: sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānassa pana maggañāṇassa paṭilabhanato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato paññā pariyosānaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:5_6: Ādipariyosānadassanena ca sakalabuddhaguṇā nayato dassitā honti.
tika-abh08t24:5_8: itarathā tādisassa sabbaññubuddhassapi vacanapathātītaṁ tathāgataguṇaṁ anupadaṁ vaṇṇento ko nāma pariyosānamāharituṁ sakkuṇeyyāti.
tika-abh08t24:6_0: Evaṁ karuṇāpaññāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalabuddhaguṇehi bhagavantaṁ thometvāpi puna attano buddhaguṇasaṁkittane
tika-abh08t24:6_1: atittābhāvena ceva paresañca pasādabāhullajananatthaṁ tadantogadhepi visiṭṭhaguṇe padhānabhāvena nīharitvā
tika-abh08t24:6_3: Tattha “tathāgata”nti tathā āgatatādīhi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataṁ.
tika-abh08t24:8_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
tika-abh08t24:8_3: Manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena yena abhinīhārena te bhagavanto āgatā,
tika-abh08t24:8_4: teneva ca abhinīhārena ayampi bhagavā āgato,
tika-abh08t24:8_5: yathā ca te bhagavanto samatiṁsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāgādīni sampādetvā āgatā,
tika-abh08t24:8_6: yathā ca te sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā,
tika-abh08t24:8_7: tathā ayampi bhagavā āgatoti evaṁ tāva tathā āgato”ti tathāgato. (1)
tika-abh08t24:9_1: Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena gatā,
tika-abh08t24:9_2: yathā vā te samathavipassanāmaggehi taṁ taṁ akusalapakkhaṁ vidhamitvā gatā,
tika-abh08t24:10_1: Yasmā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ yaṁ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṁ tathaṁ avitathaṁ,
tika-abh08t24:10_3: tasmā tathalakkhaṇaṁ āgatoti tathāgato gamanatthānaṁ bujjhanatthasambhavato.
tika-abh08t24:11_3: tathametaṁ avitathameta’ntiādivacanato ‘avijjāya saṅkhārānaṁ paccayaṭṭho saṅkhārānaṁ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho
tika-abh08t24:11_4: tatho avitatho anaññatho’tiādivacanato ca tathadhammasaṅkhāte saccapaṭiccasamuppāde yāthāvato āgato abhisambuddho,
tika-abh08t24:12_1: Yasmā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ chadvāraggahite ārammaṇe aviparītameva passati jānāti,
tika-abh08t24:12_3: yaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāyā’tiādinā tathamesa aviparītaṁ vibhajati dasseti,
tika-abh08t24:12_5: taṁ vā āgamayati dassetīti tathāgatoti evaṁ tathadassitāya tathāgato. (5)
tika-abh08t24:13_1: Yasmā esa abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā rāgamadādinimmathanavasena ekasadisameva dhammaṁ tathaṁ avitathaṁ bhāsati,
tika-abh08t24:13_5: kāraṁ katvā tathāgatoti vuttoti evaṁ tathavāditāya tathāgato. (6)
tika-abh08t24:14_1: Bhagavā hi ‘yathā vādī tathā kārī’ti vacanato attano vācāya anurūpameva karoti,
tika-abh08t24:14_3: tathā kāyopi gato pavatto imassāti tathāgatoti evaṁ tathākāritāya tathāgato. (7)
tika-abh08t24:15_1: Yasmā panesa anupamāya sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampadāya samannāgatattā sadevakaṁ lokaṁ abhibhuyya pavattati,
tika-abh08t24:16_3: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino,
tika-abh08t24:16_5: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto yathāvutto agado etassāti da-
tika-abh08t24:16_7: kāraṁ katvā tathāgatoti vuccatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-abh08t24:41_0: Kenaci guṇena attano visiṭṭhassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
tika-abh08t24:41_1: Bhagavato hi avīcito paṭṭhāya yāva bhavaggaṁ tiriyaṁ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu na koci kenaci guṇena samasamopi atthi,
tika-abh08t24:44_7: Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānamaññatarā cetanā kāyaviññattiṁ samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyadvārappavattivasena
tika-abh08t24:44_9: sāyeva vacīviññattiṁ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārappavattivasena uppannā vacīvandanāti,
tika-abh08t24:44_10: ubhayaviññattiyo pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā kevalaṁ manodvārappavattivasena uppannā manovandanāti.
tika-abh08t24:44_19: saddassa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato abujjhi savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṁ vigato,
tika-abh08t24:44_21: Bhagavā hi vatthusabhāvadassanavibandhikāya avijjāsaṅkhātāya niddāya ariyamaggañāṇena saha vāsanāya samucchinnattā tato accantaṁ vigato.
tika-abh08t24:45_0: Ettāvatā ca dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti attahitasampattito,
tika-abh08t24:45_2: Tāsu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamo savāsanasakalasaṁkilesānamaccantappahānaṁ anupādisesanibbānādhigamo ca,
tika-abh08t24:45_4: Tattha dhammadesanāya abhājanesu devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṁ hitajjhāsayatā aparipākagatindriyānaṁ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca āsayo nāma.
tika-abh08t24:45_5: Tadaññasattānaṁ pana lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa yānattayamukhena sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanā payogo nāma.
tika-abh08t24:45_11: tathadassanaṭṭhena ca tathāgataṭṭhena ca tathāgatasaddena payogavasena,
tika-abh08t24:46_0: Apica hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehipi bhagavato thomanā pavattatīti taṁvasenapettha thomanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t24:46_10: Aggamaggabhāvanāya sabbakilesānaṁ saha vāsanāhi anuppattidhammatāpādanaṁ pahānasampadā.
tika-abh08t24:46_13: Sakalalokanayanābhisekabhūtā pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitā attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma.
tika-abh08t24:46_18: Phalasampadāsu ñāṇasampadā ceva pahānasampadā ca anantapaññā- vacanena,
tika-abh08t24:47_0: Evaṁ buddharatanassa thomanāpubbaṅgamaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto āha “dhammaṁ sādhugaṇampi cā”ti.
tika-abh08t24:47_2: suppaṭipannatādayo saṅghaguṇā ca dassitā honti tappabhavassa anaññathābhāvatoti na tesaṁ visuṁ thomanā katā.
tika-abh08t24:47_3: Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe puggale yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjamāne ca apāyadukkhesu ceva vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh08t24:52_0: Ettha hi kāmarāgādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati etenāti “rāgavirāgo”ti maggo kathito.
tika-abh08t24:52_2: antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyaṁ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā “anejamasoka”nti phalaṁ kathitaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:52_5: pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato suṭṭhu vibhajitattā ca “appaṭikūla”ntiādinā sabbopi pariyattidhammo kathito.
tika-abh08t24:52_6: Tattha ariyamagganibbānāni nippariyāyeneva apāyādito dhāraṇato dhammo,
tika-abh08t24:52_10: nibbānassa ca ālambaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyapi ubhinnampi nippariyāyato labbhati.
tika-abh08t24:52_11: Itaresu pana ariyaphalassa maggena samucchinnakilesānaṁ paṭipassaddhakiccatāya,
tika-abh08t24:52_12: maggānukūlappavattito pariyattidhammassa ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhinnampi pariyāyatova labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t24:53_2: sādhu cāyaṁ gaṇo cāti vā sādhugaṇo,
tika-abh08t24:53_3: sādhuno vā sammāsambuddhassa āyatto gaṇo tassa orasaputtabhāvatoti sādhugaṇo.
tika-abh08t24:53_10: Keci “gaṇo”ti idha pakaraṇatova ariyagaṇapuggalova labbhatīti sādhūti bhāvanapuṁsakavasena “vanditvā”ti iminā saha yojenti,
tika-abh08t24:53_11: tadā pana sādhūti bhayalābhādivirahena sakkaccaṁ ādaranti attho.
tika-abh08t24:54_1: Evaṁ pakaraṇārambhe yathādhippetaṁ ratanattayappaṇāmaṁ katvā idāni yattha pāṭavatthāya idaṁ pakaraṇaṁ paṭṭhapīyati,
tika-abh08t24:54_2: taṁ saddhiṁ desakadesapaṭiggāhakasampattīhi vibhāvetvā dassento āha “paṇḍukambalanāmāyā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t24:54_3: Tattha devarājassa paṇḍukambalanāmāya silāya vimale sītale tale nisinno atulavikkamo devadevehi pūjito
tika-abh08t24:54_4: devadevo devapurakkhato devānaṁ devalokasmiṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ desesīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t24:55_2: Sā hi sakkassa tādisapuññānubhāvena nibbattā paṇḍukambalajayasumanapupphasamānena vaṇṇena sabbakālaṁ virocati,
tika-abh08t24:55_12: appamāṇena ca ñāṇabalena na kassaci devabrahmādīsu aññatarassa balatulanāya upanetabbaṁ atthi.
tika-abh08t24:55_13: Atha vā anaññasādhāraṇattā atulyo parakkamasaṅkhāto aparimāṇaguṇavisesāvahena anaññasādhāraṇena sammappadhānena
tika-abh08t24:55_14: samannāgatattā vā atulyo sammappadhānasaṅkhāto vikkamo imassāti atulyavikkamo.
tika-abh08t24:55_18: kārapaccayassāpi sambhavato atulo vikkamo assāti “atulavikkamo”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:56_9: Atha vā devanīyā taṁtaṁbyasananittharaṇatthikehi “saraṇaṁ parāyaṇa”nti gamanīyā,
tika-abh08t24:56_23: Na hi aññesaṁ devalokesu nisinno bhagavā abhidhammapiṭakaṁ desesīti.
tika-abh08t24:57_2: Yathāvuttānaṁ tiṇṇampi devānaṁ uttamo devo tehi sabbehi adhikataraṁ kīḷanādiyogatoti devadevo, bhagavā.
tika-abh08t24:57_3: So hi niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānasiddhāya pañcavidhamāravijayicchānibbattiyā
tika-abh08t24:57_5: yathāparādhayathānulomayathādhammānusāsanasaṅkhātena ca vohārātisayena paramāya paññāya ca sarīrappabhāsaṅkhātāya
tika-abh08t24:57_7: ca samannāgatattā sadevakena vā lokena “saraṇa”nti gamanīyato,
tika-abh08t24:57_9: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitoti sabbadevehi pūjanīyataro devo,
tika-abh08t24:57_10: visuddhidevabhāvasaṅkhātassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa adhigatattā aññesañca devānaṁ atisayena devoti devadevo.
tika-abh08t24:57_11: Devānanti tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṁ dasasahassacakkavāḷādhivāsīnaṁ mātudevaputtappamukhānaṁ upapattidevānaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:57_13: Te pana upapattidevesveva saṅgahitā manussaarahantānaṁ tattha abhāvato.
tika-abh08t24:57_15: Visuddhidevā hi vuttanayena itaradevehi sātisayaṁ kīḷanādiyogato idha “devadevā”ti adhippetā, tehi.
tika-abh08t24:58_0: Nanu ca “devāna”nti vacaneneva devapurakkhatabhāvo siddhoti kiṁ “devapurakkhato”ti vacanena?
tika-abh08t24:58_2: Bhagavā hi kadāci cūḷapanthakattherādīnaṁ viya parammukhepi nisīditvā obhāsaṁ vissajjetvā sattānaṁ sammukhe nisinnaṁ viya dassento dhammaṁ deseti,
tika-abh08t24:58_3: kadācipi pārāyanikabrāhmaṇādīnaṁ viya sammukhepi nisīditvā aññehi ca parivuto aññesampi dhammaṁ deseti,
tika-abh08t24:58_5: devehiyeva parivuto devānaṁ desetīti dassanatthaṁ “devapurakkhato”tipi vattabbamevāti.
tika-abh08t24:59_1: Evametasmiṁ pakaraṇe gāravajananatthaṁ tena sampādetabbapāṭavavisayaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ desakādisampattīhi
tika-abh08t24:59_9: Tathā hi yo paro na hoti,
tika-abh08t24:60_3: Taṁ sandhāya vividhanayaggahaṇasamatthassa sutamayañāṇassa uppādanatthanti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t24:60_5: bhindanti vā pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhū, tesaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:60_11: Tattha pariyattibhājanatthatoti pariyattiatthena ceva bhājanatthena ca.
tika-abh08t24:60_12: Tathā hi “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu pariyatti piṭakanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t24:60_13: “Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭaka”ntiādīsu yaṁ kiñci bhājanampi.
tika-abh08t24:65_2: Ettha hi “satto puggalo bhikkhū”tiādikaṁ lokavohāramatikkamma “khandhadhātuāyatana”ntiādinā yathādhammavaseneva bāhulladesanā pavattā,
tika-abh08t24:65_6: tasmā tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṁ buddhavacanabhāvepi yathāsabhāvānatikkamadesanādito idameva tīsu piṭakesu visiṭṭhanti yuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:65_8: Abhidhamme hi nippadesato khandhāyatanādidhammānaṁ vibhattattā itaradvayato atirekatarā,
tika-abh08t24:65_11: visiṭṭhassa ca pāḷidhammassa vasena idameva tīsu piṭakesu uttamanti vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t24:65_14: Apica vuḍḍhimantādidhammānaṁ ettha vuttattā cetaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:67_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti. ;
tika-abh08t24:68_1: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā,
tika-abh08t24:68_2: “rūpārammaṇaṁ vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhitabbattā salakkhaṇāpi “sekkhā dhammā asekkhā dhammā,
tika-abh08t24:68_3: lokuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitā pūjārahāpi “phasso hoti,
tika-abh08t24:68_4: vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi “mahaggatā dhammā appamāṇā dhammā,
tika-abh08t24:68_5: anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikā visiṭṭhāpi dhammā vuttā,
tika-abh08t24:68_7: saddassa vuḍḍhiādiatthesupi pavattanato “vuḍḍhimanto dhammā etthā”tiādinā nibbacanena idaṁ piṭakaṁ “abhidhamma”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t24:68_8: Abhidhammaṁ otaranti anenāti abhidhammāvatāraṁ nāma pakaraṇaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:68_11: Ācariyena hi gāthāpadapūraṇatthaṁ yebhuyyena tattha tattha nipātā vuccanti.
tika-abh08t24:68_16: idha pana iṭṭhabhāvasāmaññena atthabyañjanasampatti madhurasaddena vuttā.
tika-abh08t24:68_19: Tena pana madhurena yogato idampi madhuraṁ yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīluppalanti.
tika-abh08t24:68_20: Nipuṇagambhīrāya byañjanasampattiyā ceva atthasampattiyā ca abhidhammavisayaṁ matiṁ vaḍḍhetīti mativaḍḍhanaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:69_4: mohoyeva abhidhammamahāpuraṁ pavisantānaṁ pavesananivāraṇattā kavāṭabhūtoti mohakavāṭaṁ, tassa.
tika-abh08t24:69_10: Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇavasena vuccati yathā “corehi gāmo daḍḍho,
tika-abh08t24:70_2: Mahaṇṇavopi hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro na sakkā aññatra sinerupabbatarājato kenaci patiṭṭhaṁ laddhuṁ,
tika-abh08t24:70_3: evamidampi catugambhīratāpaṭisaṁyuttaṁ aññatra tathāgatā na kenaci patiṭṭhaṁ laddhuṁ sakkāti.
tika-abh08t24:71_3: Yathā hi manussānaṁ bahūsu ratanādīsu vijjamānesupi āpadāsu ca sukhaparibhogatthaṁ hatthe kayiramānaṁ sāraratanādikaṁ “hatthasāra”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t24:71_4: evamidampi satipi mahante abhidhammapiṭake tassa sabbaso vittiṇṇatāya pariharituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā tadatthasārasampiṇḍanavasena
tika-abh08t24:71_5: kayiramānaṁ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṁ sukhapariharaṇatthāya sampajjatīti hatthasārasadisattā “hatthasāra”nti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:71_10: Atthavasena pakārena kathentopi saddavasena saṅkhipitvā kathessāmīti dassento āha “samāsenā”ti.
tika-abh08t24:71_14: Ettāvatā ca payojanābhidhānābhidheyyasotujanasamussāhanakaraṇappakārāni dassetvā idāni yasmā sotujanasamussāhanaṁ
tika-abh08t24:71_16: tasmā te tattha niyojento āha “taṁ suṇātha samāhitā”ti.
tika-abh08t24:71_18: Tattha tanti taṁ mayā vakkhamānaṁ abhidhammāvatāraṁ suṇātha nisāmayatha.
